creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: large black circle at C in a square frame that is blue and red on L, and shades of gray on R; frame is formed of interlocking geometric shapes
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on embossed paper
text: Practically nothing is known about Amano’s creative intentions, or whether he selected his titles to convey ideas about the images he created. The title of this work seems to resonate with the imperfect symmetry of the composition.
title: Self-figure (Mirror)
